questions.text: Select the pair(s) of social platforms that are adopted by different police departments to engage with people?
Which of the following tweet(s) is done by the official or verified twitter account of the Hyderabad police?
Choose the correct option for a research question: “How do citizens and police engage in social media discussion threads”?
Which of the following pieces of information about a user is/are returned by the Twitter API?
options: The user’s contact to sign up with Twitter
The number of followers of user
questions.correctAnswer: The user’s username | The number of followers of user | The Geo-location of user

questions.text: Given below the graphs: Here X-axis shows the total number of posts of a particular type. Y-axis shows the post type. Which is the most important issue that is reflected in the graph?
When did Prof. PK join Twitter?
As discussed in the lecture, what is the communication style of posts done by citizens and police on social media?
options: Informal, formal by citizen and formal by police
Informal, formal by citizen and Informal, formal by police
formal by citizen and formal by police
Informal by citizen and informal by police
questions.correctAnswer: Informal, formal by citizen and formal by police
